text: ( Source : eonline. com ) Life for a Teen Mom isn ’ t easy and for Jenelle Evans, it ’ s pretty dramatic as well. On Thursday, news broke that Evans was recently hospitalized after authorities responded to an alleged assault that took place at her and husband David Eason ‘ s North Carolina home. A rep for Evans told People that the 26 - year - old reality star “ had friends over Saturday night and they had a bonfire on her property ” and that “ Jenelle ended up tripping and falling by the fire. ” The police chief with the Columbus County Sheriff Department told the outlet that officers had responded to a 911 call, which was “ called in as an assault. ” Meanwhile, Evans has not commented publicly but did deactivate her Twitter account.
